DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Efficacy MEDI8968 Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease
DOC.detailed_description: A Phase 2 double-blind , placebo-controlled study evaluate efficacy MEDI8968 Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease . The study screen phase 23 day , treatment phase Week 1 53 follow-up phase Week 53 69 . Participants receive either MEDI8968 600 milligram ( mg ) intravenous ( IV ) infusion Day 1 follow 300 mg injection subcutaneously ( SC ) every 4 week Week 53 match placebo fashion . Participants primarily assess incidence rate moderate severe acute exacerbation chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( AECOPD ) . Safety monitor throughout study .
